channel.title: RackHD
channel.description: RackHD HomePage: RackHD is a technology stack for enabling automated hardware management and orchestration through cohesive APIs.

item.title: RackHD Developer Summit in Hopkinton
item.description: RackHD Dev Summit 2016 will be hold around Nov in Hopkinton, MA, at Dell EMC. The Dev Leads and Core Committers will participate and discuss the next step of RackHD.

item.title: RackHD will have its release in near term. please expect!
item.description: RackHD is planning to have verified release in short term, including debian package(Ubuntu 14.04), vagrant box, docker images, and maybe VMWare OVA. Stay tuned.
